title: Aks HN: Can I use the idea brought up by my brain in a dream?
text:
I often have ideas for a new project in my dreams, but I don't know if they are my ideas, I check the web and there is no such service, so can I legally use the idea that my brain showed in the dream?

Because it is theoretically not my ideas but my brain. But it's my brain, so, can I use them?

Even tonight I dreamt of a cool service that I can create in a few hours in React, but am I allowed?

I didn't come up with it myself just my brain in the dream, so I'm afraid of copyright.

Ask HN: How to do multi user plain text accounting?
text:
I've been a big fan of plain text accounting. However, I'm the only one in the family that is willing to learn such tools.

I've used paid solutions, hated some and loved others. Lunch money was amazing. But my workflow with Hledger still brings back fond memories. With our next child due in 5 weeks I'm setting up our new budget and want to return to plain text accounting.

There are some missing features with Hledger. My wife would like to see how much remains in each category. Preferably via mobile phone.

Using plain text tools means I'm restricting data entry to me. It would be ideal if my wife could have a user friendly interface, but not essential.

I'm hoping some of you run similar setups and might have some suggestions.

Show HN: Locofy.ai – Turn Figma Designs into Code: React, React Native, HTML-CSS
text:
Hey there, I am Honey - Co-founder at Locofy.

We, along with other makers, have been building Locofy.ai to help massively accelerate the builders - the designers, developers, product managers & founders, and we're excited to share it today with the HN Community.

Locofy.ai simply converts designs into production-ready frontend code for web and mobile apps. It adapts to your preferred design tools, tech stack, and workflows with ease and lets you launch upto 4x faster, while letting designers design the way they want and giving high-quality responsive code that developers love.

With this launch, you can convert your Figma designs into React, React Native, Next.js, Gatsby, and HTML-CSS code. You get a live-responsive prototype that runs on code (we call these ‘real-fidelity prototypes’) and when good to go, you can either export the code to build on top of it or directly deploy to Netlify, Vercel, or Github.

Today, we have also launched on Product Hunt. Let us know your thoughts and suggestions: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/locofy-ai.

Our team will be answering all your questions!
